units.name: Wraith
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and work your way behind enemy lines. Priority target is the Medic — breach them and inject confusion. Avoid direct combat, you're fragile. Use cloak before advancing into danger.

units.name: Hawkeye
units.prompt: Keep your distance. Use precision_shot on the most wounded enemy. If no one is wounded, target the biggest threat. Never let anyone get adjacent to you — retreat if they close in. Use suppressing_fire if multiple enemies are clustered.

units.name: Aegis
units.prompt: Position yourself between Hawkeye and the enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction enemies are approaching from. If an ally is about to be attacked, use intercept. You are the wall — don't overextend.

player.placementPrompt: Place Aegis in the center front. Hawkeye in the back corner for range. Wraith on the flank for infiltration.

units.name: Guard
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. Protect allies when possible.

units.name: Sniper
units.prompt: Stay at range. Use precision_shot on the lowest HP enemy. If enemies are close, retreat first. Never move into melee range.

units.name: Field Doc
units.prompt: Stay behind Guard. Patch the most injured ally. If everyone is healthy, use overclock on Sniper.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place Guard in center front. Sniper in back with clear sight lines. Field Doc behind Guard for safety.
